meanings.sent1: Grandpa slowly balded over the years.
meanings.sent2: The man balded quickly after his treatment.
meanings.sent3: The tree balded its leaves in the fall.
meanings.sent4: The field balded as the crops were harvested.
meanings.sent5: The mountain balded as the snow melted away.

meanings.definition: Having no hair on the head.
meanings.sent1: The baby's balded head was smooth to touch.
meanings.sent2: The balded man wore a hat to protect his scalp.
meanings.sent3: The balded doll looked cute with its painted hair.
meanings.sent4: The balded eagle soared high in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The balded cat purred contentedly in the sun.

meanings.sent1: The balded patch on his head was noticeable.
meanings.sent2: She covered the balded area with a stylish headband.
meanings.sent3: The balded spot on the carpet was from the pet's scratching.
meanings.sent4: The balded section of the lawn needed reseeding.
meanings.sent5: The balded part of the painting added character to the artwork.
